afrobarometer
  • Reference

Load data for an Afrobarometer Survey round as a local tibble

After the local database has been build, this function reads data for the specified round into R as a local tibble.

afrb_round(round)

Arguments

round

An integer of the round to select. As of February 2017, there is questionnaire data available for Rounds 1 through 6.

Value

tbl A local tibble with data for the round. If spatial data is available for the round, then the objet returned by afrobarometer::afrb_round(x) will be merged spatial and questionnaire data for round x.

Examples

not_run({
  library(afrobarometer)
  afrb_dir("~/foo")
  afrb_build(overwrite = TRUE)
  r3 <- afrb_round(3)
})

  • Value
